title: I can't use the RCS chat
content:
I can't send the message through internet even though RCS chat features are enabled. I don't know what happens, if I send the message it will be sent has SMS only. 
I also cleared cache and all that still it's not sent via internet. 
Please tell me the receiver also have to enable chat features or not? 
Can I send the message via internet to iMessage users?
